game.name: Peacemaker: Bloody Emperor
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: A JRPG about a princess knight's psychological downfall. An honorable princess knight must fight the Bloody Emperor, a ruthless usurper. But through a forced marriage to a vassal and the looming threat of a female dark lord, her ideals gradually begin to crumble...
